body:
Hello fellow Avicusses!

Today we have decided to create a small section of the forums for you to ask the senior staff team directly questions of whatever matter you think we could provide an answer too, and is still Avicus related and doesn't treat personal matters with a staff member. Staff complaints still go and go only to support@avicus.net 

Only senior staff will answer your questions, and no other but you can reply to your thread.

Please still abide by the rules and keep it chill.
Regards,
Javi

replies.body:
I believe we've made quite a few Q&As in the paste and the following were the results:

A) The thread was used for awhile, then died
B) Players would just make separate threads asking questions directed towards seniors

Its nice to have a sub forum because it keeps it nice and organized, and stops certain questions from being forgotten.

replies.body: What does my team need to do to get a ts channel?
replies.body_tagged: What does my team need to do to get a ts channel?

replies.body:
• At least 10 active players who are not banned.

    • At least 10 logged scrimmages.

    • 10 Players with over 24 hours of ingame time (who are not banned).

    • 10 Players with at least 2500 kills, or 100 objectives (who are not banned).

    • Official consent (At Least 2). (In the event that a Head of Teamspeak sees fit, we can approve/deny your request for a channel.)

    • Failure to be active on your channel will result in a reconsideration of whether it should remain.
replies.body_tagged:
• At least 10 active players who are not banned.

    • At least 10 logged scrimmages.

    • 10 Players with over 24 hours of ingame time (who are not banned).

    • 10 Players with at least 2500 kills, or 100 objectives (who are not banned).

    • Official consent (At Least 2). (In the event that a Head of Teamspeak sees fit, we can approve/deny your request for a channel.)

    • Failure to be active on your channel will result in a reconsideration of whether it should remain.

reply_to.body: What does my team need to do to get a ts channel?

replies.body: When will staff applications reopen again?
replies.body_tagged: When will staff applications reopen again?

replies.body:
If the staff team follows Ryan's (Rinn) system with a three month break between each application batch then...
  • Late July to August time.
Please use the actual subforum instead of asking questions on the announcement post, cheers.

replies.body:
Unfortunately I don't expect that'll be possible as stated in this (https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/1aa662387) thread, the follow statement:

  • 'The officials have decided on no roster changes after the 22nd of May at 4pm BST - the date registration closes.'

This is not an official answer.
